name: MonkDescribe
description: Model management operations. Create, read, update, delete models and fields. Operations: list (all models), get (single model metadata), create (new model), update (model metadata), delete (drop model), addField (add field to model), updateField (modify field definition), deleteField (remove field). Requires authentication. Use this for model introspection and DDL operations. Returns data in format set during auth (default: TOON).

model.description: Model name (required for all operations except 'list')

params.description: Operation-specific parameters. For field operations: {field_name, type, required, default_value, description}. For model operations: {description, ...metadata}.
